<a id="QuadMesh"></a>

# QuadMesh

**Inherits:** [PlaneMesh](PlaneMesh.md) **\<** [PrimitiveMesh](PrimitiveMesh.md) **\<** [Mesh](Mesh.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Class representing a square mesh facing the camera.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Class representing a square [PrimitiveMesh](PrimitiveMesh.md). This flat mesh does not have a thickness. By default, this mesh is aligned on the X and Y axes; this rotation is more suited for use with billboarded materials. A **QuadMesh** is equivalent to a [PlaneMesh](PlaneMesh.md) except its default [PlaneMesh.orientation](PlaneMesh.md#PlaneMesh_property_orientation) is [PlaneMesh.FACE_Z](PlaneMesh.md#PlaneMesh_constant_FACE_Z).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->
